alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Knott; Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:26AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harlan, Letcher, southern Knott and southern Pike Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 426 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Daisy, or 9 miles south of Hazard, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vicco, Ulvah, Bluefield, Banks, Sassafras, Wiscoal and Anco around 430 AM EDT. Letcher, Blackey, Elko, Indian Bottom, Red Star, Carcassonne, David, Roxana, Arminta and Gander around 435 AM EDT. Bath, Hot Spot, Premium, Van, Trailer, Jeremiah, Oscaloosa, Isom, Ice and Tillie around 440 AM EDT. Whitesburg, Bellcraft, Southdown, Marlowe, Crown, Colly, Ermine, Whitco, Polly and Dongola around 445 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
